Title: Unreliable data validation
Description: There's a flow in Validation::compare() and Validation::range() that makes possible to pass validation criteria using crafted data.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.5.9, all versions starting from 2.6.0 before 2.6.11, all versions starting from 2.7.0 before 2.7.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.5.9 before 2.6.0-stable, all versions starting from 2.6.11 before 2.7.0-stable, all versions starting from 2.7.2
